Package pengu.messenger

This package provides the Working classes for Pengu Messenger.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APICommunicator
    This class is used to make HTTP requests with an API server.
    APICommunicator.Request
    A Request object is returned when a request is made to the API server.
    PenguMessage
    This class is used to differ service-sent messages, from user-sent messages
    PenguMessage.ContentItem
    This class is used to store a message's content, and the type of the content.
    PenguMessenger
    This is the main class for the Pengu Messenger application.
    PenguMessengerClient
    This class provides all the methods necessary for the Pengu Messenger application.
    PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem
    This class allows for active chat objects to be created so that active chat information can be stored in an array.
    PenguMessengerClient.ContactItem
    This class allows for contact objects to be created so that contacts information can be stored in an array.
    PenguMessengerClient.ContactType
    This class allows for Contact Type(Groups) Objects to be created so that they and their properties can be stored in an array with other Contact Types.
    PenguMessengerClient.Message
    This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
    PenguMessengerClient.PrivateKeyLink
    This class is used to link a private key to a public key (or public key hash).
    PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage
    This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
    PenguMessengerRESTClient
    This class provides the methods necessary for communicating with the Pengu Messenger (PENGU) API Server.
    PenguMessengerRESTClient.Message
    This class extend the MessageReference class by adding a field for message content.
    PenguMessengerRESTClient.MessageReference
    This class allows for MessageReference objects to be created, it links a message reference to a sender and size.
    PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey
    This class allows for a public key object to be created to link a public key String to a username, expiry date and registration date.
    PenguRESTClient
    This class is used when wanting to communicate with any Pengu API server That uses a REST architectural style.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
    Exception class for any server related problem, excluding Forbidden and BadRequest
    PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException
    An exception for BadConnections.
    PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException
    An exception for Bad requests.
    PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
    An exception for Forbidden responses.
    PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException
    An exception for Not found responses.
    PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException
    An exception for Server error responses.
    PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException
    An exception for Service down responses.
    PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException
    An exception for Unauthorized responses.

Package pengu.messenger Description

This package provides the Working classes for Pengu Messenger.
